summary: The 'AI for Mainstreet Act' aims to help small businesses utilize artificial intelligence. It amends the Small Business Act to require small business development centers to provide guidance, training, and information on AI, covering topics like best practices, data protection, cybersecurity, regulatory compliance, and operational incorporation. The bill also defines artificial intelligence according to the National Artificial Intelligence Initiative Act of 2020. Importantly, it specifies that no additional funding is authorized to implement the bill.
